header.tagline: Ukuphepha Okwenziwe Ngezifiso Zakho, Ukuthobela Okwenziwe Lula‚ÄîNganoma Yiliphi Isikhathi, Noma Kuphi
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Hlola amathuluzi ethu abanzi kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini endaweni yakho yokusebenza.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukusebenzisa abahlinzeki abanokwethenjelwa abanokuziphatha kahle kunganciphisa izingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wenziwa ngesikhathi kanye nezinga eliphezulu kanye namazinga okuphepha?
intro.title: Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlola amathuluzi ethu abanzi kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini endaweni yakho yokusebenza.
welcome.title: Wamukelekile ku-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Iplathifomu yakho ethembekile yokuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini (OHS) eNingizimu Afrika. Sihlinzeka ngamathuluzi azenzakalelayo, athuthukiswe yi-AI ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha kanye nokuthobela imigomo ezindaweni zokusebenza, ezikoleni, emasontweni, kanye nezingxenye ezingahlelekile. Joyina umphakathi wethu ukuze uthole izinsiza, izinsizakalo, kanye nokwesekwa okwenziwe ngezifiso zakho.
why_choose.title: Kungani Ukhetha i-SafetyHelp Yokuthobela i-OHS?
why_choose.content: I-SafetyHelp ingumlingani wakho othembekile wokuthobela ukuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini eNingizimu Afrika. Iplathifomu yethu inikezela ngothotho lwamathuluzi abanzi alungiselelwe izidingo ezithile zezimboni ezifana nokwakha, izimayini, kanye nemikhiqizo. Kusukela ekudaleni izirejista zomthetho kuya ekuhloleni izingozi, i-SafetyHelp yenza izidingo ze-OHS ezinzima zibe lula ngama-wizard asebenziseka kalula kanye nokwesekwa kwesikhathi sangempela nge-chatbot yethu ephethwe yi-AI. Isekwa yimithetho yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye nezindlela ezingcono kakhulu, sinika amandla amabhizinisi ukuthi adale izindawo zokusebenza eziphephile kuyilapho eqinisekisa ukuthobela i-OHSA kanye ne-COIDA. Joyina izinkulungwane zezisebenzi ezithembele ku-SafetyHelp ukuvikela amaqembu azo kanye nokwenza izinqubo zokuphepha zibe lula.

legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela Ngokucacisa Ukuphepha Kwezempilo okuchaza izidingo eziqondile zephrojekthi.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayela Yezempilo Nokuphepha esizeni enazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.

legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(5): Ama-Arhente (PrCHSA) aphethe i-H&S egameni leklayenti, eqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) asiza osokontraka ekusebenziseni nasekuhloleni izinhlelo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Izinkombandlela ze-SACPCMP: Kufanele igcine ukubhalisa kanye nezidingo ze-CPD zobungcweti.

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyiwe
chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukuze ngikusize! Ngeseluleko se-OHS esenzelwe wena, sicela uthintane nochwepheshe.
construction.title: Ukuphepha Kwezempilo Ezokwakheni
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho yokuphepha kwezempilo ezokwakheni usebenzisa amathuluzi e-OHS e-SafetyHelp. Izinsiza zethu zikusiza ukuphatha izingozi, uthobele izidingo zomthetho, futhi uvikele abasebenzi esizeni, usebenzisa izindlela ezingcono kakhulu ezichazwe ku-'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'
legal_appointments.title: Ukuqokwa Okusemthethweni
legal_appointments.description: Phatha ukuqokwa okusemthethweni kokuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini njengoba kudingwa yimithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukuze unikeze izindima, ugcwalise imininingwane yomuntu oqokwe, futhi udale idokhumenti ebanzi enezincwadi zokuqoka, amarekhodi okuqeqesha, kanye neminye imininingwane.
organogram.title: I-Organogram Yokuqokwa Okusemthethweni kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Igama Lomuntu Oqokwe
legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Finyelela kumlomo wemibhalo ebanzi yemithetho ye-OHS, izindinganiso, kanye nezibuyekezo. Dala izirejista zomthetho ze-OHS, sesha imithetho ethize, futhi uhlolisise ubudlelwano phakathi kwemithetho. Izinguqulelo ezilula ziyatholakala ukuze zithengwe ukuze kwenziwe imibhalo yomthetho eyinkimbinkimbi ifinyeleleke kakhulu.
legislation.tools.title: Amathuluzi Omthetho
legislation.updates.title: Izibuyekezo Zomthetho kanye Nemigomo Esalungiswa
legislation.standards.title: Izindinganiso ze-OHS
services.title: Izinsizakalo ze-SafetyHelp
services.description: Thola uhlu lwezinsizakalo zokuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini eziklanyelwe ukuxhasa izindawo zokusebenza, izikole, amasonto, kanye nezingxenye ezingahlelekile kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika. Kusukela ekuboniseni kuya ekuqeqesheni, i-SafetyHelp inikezela ngezisombululo ezilungiselelwe ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthobela nokuphepha.
services.consulting.title: Ukubonisana Nge-OHS
services.consulting.description: Thola iseluleko sobuchwepheshe mayelana nokuthobela i-OHS, ukuphatha ingozi, kanye nokuqokwa okusemthethweni kochwepheshe bethu abavunyiweyo. Sisebenze nezinhlangano ezifana ne-Anglo Platinum, i-ABSA, kanye ne-Metrorail ukuhlinzeka ngezisombululo ezilungiselelwe wena.
services.training.title: Izinhlelo Zokuqeqesha
services.training.description: Finyelela ezinhlelweni zokuqeqesha ezibanzi kuzo zonke izimboni, kuhlanganise ukwakha, imikhiqizo, kanye nemfundo. Khetha ukuqeqesha kokuqalisa, izifundo ezithile zendima, kanye nokunye, konke kuhambisana nemithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika.
services.audits.title: Ukuhlola & Ukuhlola
services.audits.description: Qinisekisa ukuthi indawo yakho yokusebenza ihlangabezana nezindinganiso ze-OHS ngezinsizakalo zethu zokuhlola kanye nokuhlola. Amathuluzi ethu akusiza ukuthi wenze ukuhlola okujulile, udale imibiko, futhi usebenzise izenzo zokulungisa.
services.risk_management.title: Izinhlelo Zokuphatha Ingozi
services.risk_management.description: Dala izinhlelo zokuphatha ingozi (RMPs) ezilungiselelwe ezibandakanya umthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, imithetho yomasipala, kanye nezindinganiso zamazwe omhlaba ezifana ne-ISO 45001, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhizinisi lakho lilungiselele noma iyiphi ingozi.
services.support.title: Ukusekelwa & Amathuluzi Omphakathi
services.support.description: Joyina umphakathi wethu ukuze ubike izehlakalo, ufinyelele kuhlu lokuphepha lwezitolo zespaza, izikole, kanye namatavern, futhi uxhumane nabanye ochwepheshe be-OHS ukuze uthole ukusekelwa kanye nokusebenzisana.
training.title: Ukuqeqesha Okubanzi Kwendawo Yokusebenza
training.description: Hlola izinhlelo zethu zokuqeqesha ezibanzi zendawo yokusebenza ukuze uqinisekise ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ephephile. Khetha ukuqeqesha okusebenzayo, ukuqeqesha kweqembu, noma sebenzisa i-wizard yethu ukuze uthole iziphakamiso ezilungiselelwe imboni yakho, abantu oqondiswe kubo, kanye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe ukhetho ukuze uqale inqubo yesiphakamiso sokuqeqesha.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-5: Khetha Imboni Yakho

training.wizard.step_2.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani abantu abaqondiswe kubo abanye.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqembu Lezimo Eziphuthumayo (Osizo Lokuqala, Abacimi Bomlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-5: Imibandela Eyengeziwe

training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe ekufakeni kwakho, nazi izinhlelo zokuqeqesha ezinconyiwe. Khetha lezo ofuna ukuzifaka ku-cart yakho.
training.cart.title: I-Cart Yakho Yokuqeqesha
training.cart.customization.title: Lungisa Izinto Zakho Zokuqeqesha

training.cart.customization.fire_fighter: Sicela ufake igama lomuntu wokucima umlilo.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicela ufake inombolo yoxhumana ngezimo eziphuthumayo esebenzayo (isibonelo, +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Ihlanganiswe Ngubani
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yokulethwa Kokuqeqesha
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokulethwa:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Izinto zokuqeqesha ezinikeziwe zenzelwe ulwazi kuphela futhi azibonisi iseluleko sobuchwepheshe. Ngezisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, thintana ne-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma vakashela Ikhasi Lokuxhumana.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izinto zakho zokuqeqesha zikhiqiziwe. Landisa ama-PDF akho ngezansi. Ngoqeqesho lwe-inthanethi, amakhodi okufinyelela athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Abahlinzeki Bokuqeqesha Abavunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Ngabe udinga ukuqeqeshwa komuntu? Thintana nabahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abavunyiweyo ngezidingo zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - SETA Evunyiweyo - Igxile kwi-First Aid, Ukucima Umlilo - Uxhumano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - SACPCMP Ebhalisiweyo - Igxile kuKuphepha Kwezokwakha - Uxhumano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Ukuqeqesha Kwe-OHS Okubanzi - Uxhumano: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Imanuwali Yokuqeqesha Elungiselelwe
training.manual.purchase.description: Thola imanuwali yokuqeqesha ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, kuhlanganise izidingo zomthetho, okuqukethwe okwenziwe ngokweprofayili yakho yengozi, kanye nezikowuti ezivela kubahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayili Yakho Yengozi Yemanuwali Yokuqeqesha
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yokuqeqesha
training.legal_fact.step_1: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Isigaba 8 soMthetho we-OHS sidinga abaqashi ukuthi banikeze ukuqeqesha okulungiselelwe izingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukuqeqesha okujwayelekile kunganciphisa izehlakalo zendawo yokusebenza kufikela ku-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Omasipala bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ehlukahlukene ethinta izidingo zokuqeqesha.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Izindawo zokusebenza ezinengozi ephezulu ezifana neziza zokwakha zidinga ukuqeqesha njalo ukuze zigcine izindinganiso zokuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Iqiniso Lomthetho: UMthetho we-OHS ugunyaza ukuqeqesha okuthile kwezindima ezifana nabameleli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthobela.

legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yenziwe! Sebenzisa ikhodi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ulandise mahhala (abasebenzisi abayi-100 bokuqala).
suppliers.title: Uhlu Lwabahlinzeki Be-OHS
suppliers.description: Thola futhi ubeke abahlinzeki be-OHS eNingizimu Afrika. Phequlula ngokwendawo, izinsizakalo, kanye nokuvunywa. Thumela ukubuyekeza ukuze usize abanye benze izinqumo ezinolwazi.

suppliers.table.name: Igama Lomhlinzeki
suppliers.review_form.title: Thumela Ukubuyekeza
community_tools.title: Amathuluzi Okuphepha Komphakathi
community_tools.description: Bika noma yisiphi isigameko sokuphepha noma ingozi emphakathini wakho noma endaweni yakho yokusebenza, kusukela emigodini kuya ezintweni ezonakalisiwe. Sebenzisa amathuluzi ethu ukuze uqinisekise ukuphepha ezindaweni ezifana nezitolo zespaza, izikole, izibhedlela, kanye namataveni.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Isigameko Noma Ingozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isigameko noma ingozi (isib., umgodi kuMain Street, isihlalo esiphukile esikhungweni somphakathi)...
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ucingo noma i-imeyili (igcwalisiwe ngokuzenzakalelayo uma umhlinzeki ekhethiwe)...
Isibambo Sezokuxhumana Yomhlinzeki Wesevisi (Ongakukhetha, isib., @CityofJoburgZA ku-X):
Faka isibambo se-X (sigcwalisiwe ngokuzenzakalelayo uma umhlinzeki ekhethiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Ezinye Izinsiza Zokuphepha Komphakathi
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uhlu Lokuhlola I-OHS Yesitolo Sespaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuthi isitolo sakho sespaza sihambisana nokuphepha komlilo, ugesi, kanye nezidingo zesakhiwo ngokwezindinganiso zomasipala kanye noMthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokuphepha Komlilo Wesikole
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda izidingo zomthetho zokuphepha komlilo ezikoleni, kuhlanganise izinhlelo zokuphuma kanye nezinto zokusebenza.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokulungiselela Izimo Eziphuthumayo Esibhedlela
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuthi izibhedlela zilungiselelwe izimo eziphuthumayo ngokuba nezinhlelo zokuphuma ezifanele kanye nezinto zokuphepha.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uhlu Lokuhlola Ukuphepha Kwetavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola ukuthi amatavern athobela imithetho yokuphepha komlilo kanye nokuphatha isixuku ukuze kuvinjelwe izehlakalo.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yelungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamukelekile, [Igama Lomsebenzisi]! Lawula ukuthobela kwakho kwe-OHS, ama-RMPs, ukubuyekezwa kwabahlinzeki, kanye nemibiko yomphakathi lapha.

dashboard.rmps.title: Ama-RMPs Agciniwe
dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Ukubuyekezwa Kwabahlinzeki
dashboard.incident_reports.title: Imibiko Yezehlakalo
document_categories.title: Qamba Amadokhumenti Akho Ohlelo Lokuphatha I-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha futhi uqambe amadokhumenti odinga wona ohlelweni lwakho lokuphatha i-OHS. Khetha kwezinqubomgomo, izinqubo, izindinganiso, kanye nokunye, okulungiselelwe izidingo zenhlangano yakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Izinqubomgomo
document_categories.policies.description: Izitatimende zokuqala ezisezingeni eliphezulu zenhloso kanye nokuzibophezela, ezivunywe ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
document_categories.policies.workplace_v: Inqubomgomo Yodlame Noma Ukuhlukumeza Endaweni Yokusebenza
document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Inqubomgomo YokuHlola Ukusebenza, Ukubuyekeza, kanye Nezinjongo Ze-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: Inqubomgomo Yezokuxhumana, Ukubamba Iqhaza, kanye Nokubonisana Ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: Inqubomgomo Yezempilo kanye Nokuphila Kahle Endaweni Yokusebenza Ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_documen: Inqubomgomo YokuLawula Amadokhumenti kanye NamaRekhodi Ye-OHS
document_categories.procedures.title: Izinqubo
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Izinyathelo zokulandelela zokwenza imisebenzi ngokuphephile nangokungaguquguquki.
document_categories.procedures.hira_proc: Inqubo Yokuhlonza Ingozi kanye NokuHlola Ingozi (HIRA)
